trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_SEQ_00<tab>Stationmaster Papashan has a simple task for a fledgling adventurer.

TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_SEQ_01<tab>Papashan feels for the Sultansworn who have been tasked with defending the Dispatch Yard, and would like to do his part to keep the weary guardsmen on their feet. Take the twilight pretzels from Papashan and deliver them to the fatigued patrols.
TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_SEQ_02<tab>The sentries are most appreciative of Papashan's pretzels. Return to the Lalafellin stationmaster and inform him that the Dispatch Yard remains well protected.
TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_SEQ_03<tab>While Papashan is grateful for your assistance, there appears to be something else on his mind.
TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_TODO_00<tab>Deliver twilight pretzels to the patrols.
TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Papashan.
TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_PAPASHAN_000_1<tab>Since you've come all this way, perhaps you can perform an errand for me.
TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_PAPASHAN_000_2<tab>It just so happens a number of sentries have been sent to guard the area. A dispatch to the Dispatch Yard, as it were.
TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_PAPASHAN_000_3<tab>They have long been away from the shade and featherbeds of the city. The hot days and cold nights can play hells on the mind and body out here.
TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_PAPASHAN_000_4<tab>It isn't much, but go and give them these twilight pretzels, would you? I find comfort food always helps when I feel like killing myself.
TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_GINCHUA_000_10<tab>Western front, clear! Eastern front, clear!
TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_GINCHUA_000_11<tab>For me? From Papashan? A twilight pretzel... My favorite! How did he know!?
TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_GINCHUA_000_12<tab>Can't fight on an empty stomach, now, can I? Actually...I can't fight on any stomach. I suppose you could say I have no stomach...for fighting.
TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_GINCHUA_000_13<tab>Brigands beware! The Sultansworn are here to serve and protect!
TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_GINCHUB_000_20<tab>Halt! <var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Sir)) /var>, I'm going to have to ask you to put the pretzel on the ground and place your hands above your head!
TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_GINCHUB_000_21<tab>State your name and business! A twilight pretzel from Papashan? By the gods, forgive me! You could say this new post has my nerves in a...twist.
TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_GINCHUB_000_22<tab>I'm...I'm terribly sorry for that. Ahem, yes, well, you may rest assured that the Dispatch Yard is safe so long as I stand watch.
TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_GINCHUB_000_23<tab>Please give Papashan my thanks, and tell him that I only wish I could repay the favor...
TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_GINCHUB_000_25<tab>Nothing to report, here. Peace reigns another day in central Thanalan.
TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_GINCHUC_000_30<tab>Twelve save me. Scorching days... Freezing nights... This post will be the end of me.
TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_GINCHUC_000_31<tab>A twilight pretzel? Don't mind if I do!
TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_GINCHUC_000_32<tab>Ahhh, now that's a refreshing godsdamned pretzel! I feel reborn!

TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_GINCHUC_000_33<tab><sigh> Much as I hate to say it, though, the pretzel does nothing to change the fact that these <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((cold nights)) ((hot days)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((hot days)) ((cold nights)) /var>)) /var> are bloody intolerable...
TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_PAPASHAN_000_40<tab>You've returned─and with a deal fewer pretzels, I see! Tell me, how fare our Sultansworn sentries? Did they have anything to report, anything at all!?
TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_PAPASHAN_000_41<tab>What? Nothing? Are you sure? I...oh, oh dear.
TEXT_SUBWIL025_00671_PAPASHAN_000_42<tab>Take this for your troubles, then. And stay a moment─there is more I would ask of you.
